about_the_game:
The Xbox 360 Indie hit is now coming to PC!

Deadburg is a co-op survival game set in a procedurally generated city with thousands of buildings to explore and zombies to kill. Every building you see can be explored, exploited and destroyed one block at a time. Play alone or with friends and discover the secrets of the city while you craft items, find supplies and learn new skills.

FEATURES

  • WORLD - A large procedurally generated city awaits you, filled with zombies and loot. Every block can be broken, you can build a building or raze one to the ground.
  • MULTIPLAYER - Play alone or with up to 3 friends.
  • GAME MODES - Multiple game modes to tailor your zombie survival experience.
  • DIFFICULTIES - Multiple difficulties to make the zombies more threatening if you feel you're up to it.
  • CRAFTING- Craft weapons and supplies to utilize against the zombie menace.
  • BASE BUILDING - Build a 100% custom building, or modify an existing structure. Full terrain editing means you can make whatever base you want.
  • CHARACTER - As you survive your character will become stronger, unlocking additional bonuses and skills.

GAME MODES

  • SURVIVAL - The base survival game. Kill zombies, scavenge loot, craft weapons, build a base.
  • DEFENSE - Surviving just got a little harder. The horde will come for you, best you be prepared.
  • LAST LIFE - Survival means little if there isn't a penalty for death. If your character dies in Last Life it's game over.
  • CREATIVE - Don't like the city? Want to make some changes? Creative mode allows you to modify an existing city and then convert it into another game mode.
detailed_description:
The Xbox 360 Indie hit is now coming to PC!

Deadburg is a co-op survival game set in a procedurally generated city with thousands of buildings to explore and zombies to kill. Every building you see can be explored, exploited and destroyed one block at a time. Play alone or with friends and discover the secrets of the city while you craft items, find supplies and learn new skills.

FEATURES

  • WORLD - A large procedurally generated city awaits you, filled with zombies and loot. Every block can be broken, you can build a building or raze one to the ground.
  • MULTIPLAYER - Play alone or with up to 3 friends.
  • GAME MODES - Multiple game modes to tailor your zombie survival experience.
  • DIFFICULTIES - Multiple difficulties to make the zombies more threatening if you feel you're up to it.
  • CRAFTING- Craft weapons and supplies to utilize against the zombie menace.
  • BASE BUILDING - Build a 100% custom building, or modify an existing structure. Full terrain editing means you can make whatever base you want.
  • CHARACTER - As you survive your character will become stronger, unlocking additional bonuses and skills.

  • DEFENSE - Surviving just got a little harder. The horde will come for you, best you be prepared.

  • CREATIVE - Don't like the city? Want to make some changes? Creative mode allows you to modify an existing city and then convert it into another game mode.
name: Deadburg

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7 , 8/8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000 or better/AMD Radeon HD 7450/Nvidia GeForce 610
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7 , 8/8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

Every building you see can be explored, exploited and destroyed one block at a time. Play alone or with friends and discover the secrets of the city.
